#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;

#define fileinput freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fileoutput freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define T ll t ; cin>>t ; while(t--)
#define fastio ios::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0)

ll dp[1002][1002]={0};
bool blocked[1002][1002]={0};

int main()
{
    ll m,n,p;
    cin>>m>>n>>p;

    for(ll i=0;i<p;i++) {
        ll a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        blocked[a][b]=1;
    }

    for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++) {
        for(ll j=1;j<=n;j++) {
            if(blocked[i][j]) dp[i][j]=0;
            else if(i==1 && j==1) dp[1][1]=1;
            else
                dp[i][j]=(dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1])%mod;
        }
    }

    cout<<dp[m][n] % mod<<endl;

    return 0;
}
